TITLE: Bacco e satiro
DESCRIPTION: Sculpture of Bacco and a Satyr by Michelangelo Buonarroti, a masterful study where classical form meets expressive realism.
SUBJECTS: Bacchus, satyr, cup of wine, leopard skin, clusters of grapes, crown of vine leaves, inebriation.
CONTENT: Statue depicting the god of wine in a state of inebriation, staggering and with a sensual and ambiguous expression.
